Description.val: The family of 40mm cartridges consists of low velocity, single shot rounds, designed to be fired from the M203 and M32 grenade launchers, as well as high velocity linked rounds designed to be fired from the MK19, 40mm grenade machine gun.  Cartridges fired from the M203 and M32 grenade launchers include signaling and marking rounds, a CS (o-chlorobenzamalono-nitrile) round, Target Practice Day/Night marker rounds, light Armor Piercing rounds, and High Explosive Dual Purpose (HEDP) rounds.  Cartridges fired from the MK19 include linked Armor Piercing and HEDP rounds, as well as linked Target Practice, Day/Night marker training rounds.

Justification.val: The funds in FY18 and out have been realigned to line item 1350.

Name.val: 1.1.1) B542, 40MM HEDP LNKD - LOAD, ASSEMBLE, AND PACK C1
2.1.1) BA21, 40MM PRACTICE DAY/NIGHT MK281 MOD3 - LOAD, ASSEMBLE, AND PACK
